channel.title: All you need to start Programming. Html5, Javascript, C#, C++ and many more
channel.description:
So after trying to find lots of books on specific programming languages I decided to release this;
Html5 booklet; http://www.mediafire.com/?b3x68dar82rixym
C++ booklet; http://www.mediafire.com/?hcnmp375mdhssj1
C booklet; http://www.mediafire.com/?a7gt35qd9adjoj7
C# booklet; http://www.mediafire.com/?9yk9sb1qt9m5err
Perl booklet; http://www.mediafire.com/?mxd9xswhmgmykhh
Ruby booklet; http://www.mediafire.com/?2iy5lleoe2pr8dk
Python booklet; http://www.mediafire.com/?qig2xk3ffo13dgy
Xml booklet; http://www.mediafire.com/?hsccezk1dddp4i4
Javascript booklet; http://www.mediafire.com/?lz4941fg589n1zo
Java booklet; http://www.mediafire.com/?9bffw4m3t3gak0w
Pascal booklet (Comes with a compiler); http://www.mediafire.com/?fz7zft171xny7bz
Hope this helps anyone, Thank you.
These are just pdf's with ALOOT if info if you don't trust don't download all I wanted to do was help people

item.title: All you need to start Programming. Html5, Javascript, C#, C++ and many more
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:16, topic:517993”]I would be very careful about looking at any of these…the poster was just banned a few moments ago for trying to keylog people in server downloads/and a couple of other sections.[/quote][quote=“imthenull, post:3, topic:517993”]inb4 virus.

I don’t trust ‘first time posters’ posting a lot of links.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: All you need to start Programming. Html5, Javascript, C#, C++ and many more
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You link to Perl, Ruby and Python but you don’t link something for PHP? Perl, rails/sinatra and django/web.py are all popular web-sided languages and frameworks but none are as widely used as PHP is, not that that’s a good thing, mind you.

Read full topic

inb4 virus.

I don’t trust ‘first time posters’ posting a lot of links.

isn’t that the reason for *nix?
[/quote]They are still capable of being haxed ;)[/quote]

shhh, dont lie

item.title: All you need to start Programming. Html5, Javascript, C#, C++ and many more
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“A.L.P.O.H, post:5, topic:517993”][quote author=imthenull link=topic=636256.msg4289571#msg4289571 date=1366998237]
inb4 virus.

I don’t trust ‘first time posters’ posting a lot of links.
[/quote]
I understand your concern but what is stopping a “Moparian” posting a load of viruses??[/quote]
Nothing. But we know that a Moparian isn’t here just to post viruses, and they will be dealt with harshly if they try.

Read full topic

item.title: All you need to start Programming. Html5, Javascript, C#, C++ and many more
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:9, topic:517993”][quote author=imthenull link=topic=636256.msg4289580#msg4289580 date=1366999785]

inb4 virus.

I don’t trust ‘first time posters’ posting a lot of links.

I understand your concern but what is stopping a “Moparian” posting a load of viruses??
[/quote]Nothing, but people that have the moparian status have some sort of reputation around here, unlike a first time poster. You’re a complete stranger to the community, no offence or anything.

I have reputation around here?[/quote]No, you’re a hax0r remember?

Read full topic
